TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GravityFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags AxisClip = int32(8)
AxisClip = 8

Docs.summary: Raw bit controlling whether the right/bottom edge is clipped to its container, based on the gravity direction being applied.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags AxisPullAfter = int32(4)
AxisPullAfter = 4

Docs.summary: Raw bit controlling how the right/bottom edge is placed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags AxisPullBefore = int32(2)
AxisPullBefore = 2

Docs.summary: Raw bit controlling how the left/top edge is placed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags AxisSpecified = int32(1)
AxisSpecified = 1

Docs.summary: Raw bit indicating the gravity for an axis has been specified.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags AxisXShift = int32(0)
AxisXShift = 0

Docs.summary: Bits defining the horizontal axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags AxisYShift = int32(4)
AxisYShift = 4

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags Bottom = int32(80)
Bottom = 80

Docs.summary: Push object to the bottom of its container, not changing its size.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags Center = int32(17)
Center = 17

Docs.summary: Place the object in the center of its container in both the vertical and horizontal axis, not changing its size.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags CenterHorizontal = int32(1)
CenterHorizontal = 1

Docs.summary: Place object in the horizontal center of its container, not changing its size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags CenterVertical = int32(16)
CenterVertical = 16

Docs.summary: Place object in the vertical center of its container, not changing its size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags ClipHorizontal = int32(8)
ClipHorizontal = 8

Docs.summary: Flag to clip the edges of the object to its container along the horizontal axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags ClipVertical = int32(128)
ClipVertical = 128

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags DisplayClipHorizontal = int32(16777216)
DisplayClipHorizontal = 16777216

Docs.summary: Special constant to enable clipping to an overall display along the horizontal dimension.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags DisplayClipVertical = int32(268435456)
DisplayClipVertical = 268435456

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags End = int32(8388613)

Docs.summary: Push object to x-axis position at the end of its container, not changing its size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.GravityFlags Fill = int32(119)
Fill = 119

Docs.summary: Grow the horizontal and vertical size of the object if needed so it completely fills its container.

FillHorizontal = 7
